description: Schema version 2.5 for representing aircraft objects in a modular design to support their various properties and updates from selected Data Providers, including operational status and capabilities.  Developed by Jeremy Mize for AF TENCAP TALON Powderhorn.

overallClassificationMarking.description: Security classification marking for the aircraft, including entities authorized to receive aircraft information.

objectUUID.description: Based on the UUID5 standard, specific UUID for this aircraft.

affiliation.description: Affiliation of the vessel (civilian, military, government, unknown).

aircraftType.description: Type or model of the aircraft.

nationality.description: GENC3 Trigraph country code associated with the vessel.

platform.description: Platform of the aircraft, e.g., fixed-wing, rotary-wing.

equipmentCode.description: Alphanumeric code representing equipment, maximum 5 characters, e.g., AB45Z.

alt.description: True altitude of the aircraft in feet above Mean Sea Level (MSL). Received as meters MSL, can also receive the 'altFt' variable, which converts the MSL to feet.

course.description: Current heading of the aircraft in degrees.

identity.description: Identification status of the vessel in operational terms (Friend, Fod, Hostile, or Unknown).

iffMode3/A.description: Identification, Friend or Foe (IFF) Mode 3/A ICAO code -- military/civilian; provides a 4-digit octal (12 bit) identification code for the aircraft, assigned by Air Traffic Controller (ATC). From Thresher, labeled as iffMode1

iffMode2.description: Identification, Friend or Foe (IFF) Mode 2 code, Military only; provides a 3-pulse reply.

latDD.description: Latitude coordinates of the aircraft in decimal degrees.

lonDD.description: Longitude coordinates of the aircraft in decimal degrees.

speed.description: Speed of the aircraft in knots.

semiMajor.description: The semi-major axis length, representing the longest radius of an ellipse in units (e.g., meters).

semiMinor.description: The semi-minor axis length, representing the shortest radius of an ellipse in units (e.g., meters).

trackQuality.description: Quality of the tracking data, per Thresher algorithms.

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp of when the update was received from the sensor or data provider.

sourceName.description: The name of the original source from which the data provider received the data.

sourceObjId.description: The unique identifier for the data provider that supplied the data.

dataMode.description: The mode of the data indicating whether it is real, simulated, or for an exercise.

sourceClassification.description: The classification marking of the data as provided by the source data provider.

assetQty.description: Quantity of the ordnance for the given asset.

nalc.description: Naval Ammunition Logistics Code (NALC) associated with the ordnance.

nomenclature.description: The official name of the ordnance.

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp of when the ordnance data was last updated by the source provider.

sourceName.description: The name of the original source from which the ordnance data was received.

sourceObjId.description: The unique identifier for the data provider that supplied the ordnance data.

dataMode.description: The mode of the ordnance data indicating whether it is real, simulated, or for an exercise.

sourceClassification.description: The classification marking of the ordnance data as provided by the source data provider.

productType.description: Type of fuel available on the vessel.

fuelQty.description: Quantity of fuel available on the vessel.

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp of when the fuel data was last updated by the original source provider.

sourceName.description: The name of the original source from which the fuel data was received.

sourceObjId.description: The unique identifier for the data provider that supplied the fuel data.

dataMode.description: The mode of the fuel data indicating whether it is real, simulated, or for an exercise.

sourceClassification.description: The classification marking of the fuel data as provided by the source data provider.

fuel.description: Information about fuel types and quantities available on the aircraft.

callsign.description: The aircraft's callsign for the mission

classification.description: The classification level of the aircraft's mission.

distFlown.description: Distance flown during the mission, in kilometers.

flightDuration.description: Time duration of the flight, in ISO 8601 time duration format.

linkOperationalStatus.description: Operational status of the connection to the Link-16 source platform.

linkPPLI.description: Precise Participant Location and Identification (PPLI) information in Link-16.

linkReportingUnit.description: Aircraft's reporting unit according to Link-16.

linkSensorId.description: Identifier of the connected sensor Link-16.

linkSpecificTypeName.description: Aircraft's specific type name in Link-16.

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp of when the update was received from the source sensor or original data provider.

sourceName.description: The name of the original source from which the data provider received the data.

sourceObjId.description: The unique identifier for the data provider that supplied the data.

dataMode.description: The mode of the data indicating whether it is real, simulated, or for an exercise.

sourceClassification.description: The classification marking of the data as provided by the original data provider.

bft.description: The aircraft's Battlefield Telecommunications (BFT) radio ID.

icao.description: The ICAO code associating with the aircraft's 'home airport' location.

modeS.description: The Mode-Select (Mode-S) transponder code for the aircraft.

parent.description: Parent organization that owns the aircraft, if the aircraft is owned by an organization.

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp of when the update was received from the source sensor or original data provider.

sourceName.description: The name of the original source from which the data provider received the data.

sourceObjId.description: The unique identifier for the original data provider that supplied the data.

dataMode.description: The mode of the data indicating whether it is real, simulated, or for an exercise.

sourceClassification.description: The classification marking of the data as provided by the data provider.

cruisespeed.description: The cruising speed of the aircraft, in kilometers per hour.

height.description: Height of the aircraft, in meters.

length.description: Length of the aircraft, in meters.

maxFuel.description: Maximum fuel capacity of the aircraft, in liters.

mtow.description: Maximum Takeoff Weight (MTOW) of the aircraft, in kilograms.

range.description: Range of the aircraft, in kilometers.

serviceCeiling.description: Service ceiling of the aircraft, in meters.

sprintCruise.description: Sprint cruise speed of the aircraft, in kilometers per hour.

wingspan.description: Wingspan of the aircraft, in meters.

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp of when the update was received from the source sensor or original data provider.

sourceName.description: The name of the original source from which the data provider received the data.

sourceObjId.description: The unique identifier for the original data provider that supplied the data.

dataMode.description: The mode of the data indicating whether it is real, simulated, or for an exercise.

sourceClassification.description: The classification marking of the data as provided by the data provider.

assocType.description: Type of association between the associated object.

items.title: associations
items.description: Information providing the type of association and the UUID of the associated object, providing the associations with other entities or objects.

sourceObjId.description: Unique identifier of the data source object.

lastUpdate.description: Timestamp of the last update from this data source.

latestObjectUpdate.description: Information about the latest update received for the object.
